title: Ensure access to APIs by Service Principals is restricted
description: Restrict access to APIs by Service Principals in Microsoft Fabric to reduce risk of unauthorized automation or data access.
displayName: Ensure access to APIs by Service Principals is restricted
rationale: Restricting API access for Service Principals reduces the risk of unauthorized automation or data exfiltration by limiting programmatic access.
impact: Some automated integrations may require review and adjustment to comply with this restriction.

remediation.text:
1. Navigate to Microsoft Fabric https://app.powerbi.com/admin-portal
2. Select Tenant settings.
3. Scroll to Export and Sharing settings.
4. Restrict API access for Service Principals as per organizational policy.
